author: Melanie Grayce West
title: Bronx Man Files Suit Against City Over Treatment in Juvenile Center
text:
A 20-year-old Bronx man has filed a lawsuit against the city, its child-welfare agency and several of the agency’s employees claiming he was repeatedly raped by a female counselor while he was held in a juvenile detention center.
Miguel Smith entered the city’s Horizon Juvenile Center in the Bronx in May 2013 when he was 15 years old and was physically and sexually abused there by staff for the Administration for Children’s Services, according to the complaint filed Monday in the U.S. District Court for the Southern District...
